oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When a swarm of locusts comes flying past the people must go to the place where the locusts settle and make fire. The rainmaker, |kannu, grew locusts and gave them to the people. 1) Date on p.6640: 10 April; p.6673: 15 May, 2) pp.6639v-6646v: see |kannu the rain sorcerer, 3) p.6652v: see The hail is the rain's legs, 4) p.6672v: see The ||kerri bird and locusts, 5) p.6679v: see Gambro or |kui and its ill-effects, 6) See also The girl who made locusts, 7) This story is found in Book VIII-7.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: About locusts
